languages.text: "Создания эти были когда-то столь робки и скрытны... неужели семя зла проникло и в них?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Они не должны были нападать на людей, этого не может быть!

languages.text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"
languages.original_text: "Создания эти были когда-то столь робки и скрытны... неужели семя зла проникло и в них?"

languages.text: “这些生物曾经是如此怯懦、如此温顺……莫非邪恶的种子也在它们身上生根发芽了吗？”
languages.original_text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"

traits.locale_text: “这些生物曾经是如此怯懦、如此温顺……莫非邪恶的种子也在它们身上生根发芽了吗？”

languages.text: «Estas criaturas eran antes tan tímidas y reticentes... ¿Es posible que el mal haya arraigado ya en ellas?».
languages.original_text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"

traits.locale_text: «Estas criaturas eran antes tan tímidas y reticentes... ¿Es posible que el mal haya arraigado ya en ellas?».

languages.text: 「こうした生物はかつては非常に臆病で、姿を現すことはなかった…彼らにも本当に邪悪の種が根付いていたのか？」
languages.original_text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"

traits.locale_text: 「こうした生物はかつては非常に臆病で、姿を現すことはなかった…彼らにも本当に邪悪の種が根付いていたのか？」

languages.text: "Diese Kreaturen waren einst so sanft, so zurückhaltend ... Kann die Saat des Bösen wirklich auch in ihnen Wurzeln geschlagen haben?"
languages.original_text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Kreaturen waren einst so sanft, so zurückhaltend ... Kann die Saat des Bösen wirklich auch in ihnen Wurzeln geschlagen haben?"

languages.text: « Ces créatures étaient si craintives, auparavant... Les germes du mal se sont-ils plantés en elles également ? »
languages.original_text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"

traits.locale_text: « Ces créatures étaient si craintives, auparavant... Les germes du mal se sont-ils plantés en elles également ? »

languages.text: "Bu yaratıklar eskiden çok ürkek, çok sessizlerdi. Kötülük onların da mı içinde kök salmış gerçekten?"
languages.original_text: "These creatures were once so timid, so reticent... Could the seed of evil truly have taken root in them as well?"
